Package com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a collection of Object3Ds and Particles.
Since:
1.0 beta
Author:
Alyx Ferrari
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • object

      public Object3D[] object
      The array of Object3Ds contained in this Scene.

    • camDist

      public double camDist
      The actual distance between the camera and its position. Used for pivoting around the camera's position.

    • particles

      public java.util.ArrayList<Particle> particles
      The array of Particles contained in this Scene.

  • Constructor Details

    • Scene

      public Scene​(Object3D[] object, double camDist)
      Constructs a Scene with the specified Object3Ds and camera distance.
      Parameters:
      object - The objects desired to be in this Scene.
      camDist - The camera distance.

    • Scene

      public Scene​(Object3D[] object, double camDist, java.util.ArrayList<Particle> particles)
      Constructs a Scene with the specified Object3Ds, Particles, and camera distance.
      Parameters:
      object - The objects desired to be in this Scene.
      camDist - The camera distance.
      particles - The Particles desired to be in this Scene.

    • Scene

      Constructs a Scene with the specified Object3Ds, Particles, and camera distance.
      Parameters:
      object - The objects desired to be in this Scene.
      camDist - The camera distance.
      particles - The Particles desired to be in this Scene.
